EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_Meetups.January 2015 meetups - CA targeted
EmailTemplate.subject: Meetups: Distributed Systems using NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud & Apache Ambari for Hadoop Clusters
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Join us this month for two awesome meetup talks in the San Francisco Bay Area.
This week Matt Stine will talk about building and implementing distributed systems using NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud, at Pivotal in San Francisco.
- Building Distributed Systems with Netflix OSS and Spring Cloud - Thursday, January 15, 2015 - Learn more and Register here: bit.ly/POSH0060 <bit.ly/POSH0060>
And next week, Newton Alex and Alexander Denissov will discuss Apache Ambari, an open source deployment & management tool for Hadoop Clusters, at Pivotal in Palo Alto.
- Apache Ambari for Hadoop Cluster deployment & management - Tuesday, January 20, 2015 - Learn more and Register here: bit.ly/POSH0061 <bit.ly/POSH0061>
We're looking forward to seeing you!
